verses.verse: O come, <S%H1980><s%> let us sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Let us shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> of our salvation. <S%H3468><s%>
Let us come <S%H6923><s%> before <S%H6923><s%> His presence <S%H6440><s%> with thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> Let us shout <S%H7321><s%> joyfully <S%H7321><s%> to Him with psalms. <S%H2158><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is a great <S%H1419><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> And a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%>
In whose <S%H834><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> are the depths <S%H4278><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> The peaks <S%H8443><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are His also.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is His, for it was He who made <S%H6213><s%> it; And His hands <S%H3027><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> the dry <S%H3006><s%> land. <S%H3006><s%>
Come, <S%H935><s%> let us worship <S%H7812><s%> and bow <S%H3766><s%> down; <S%H3766><s%> Let us kneel <S%H1288><s%> before <S%H6923><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our Maker. <S%H6213><s%>

For He is our God, <S%H430><s%> And we are the people <S%H5971><s%> of His pasture, <S%H4830><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of His hand. <S%H3027><s%> Today, <S%H3117><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you would hear <S%H8085><s%> His voice, <S%H6963><s%>
Do not harden <S%H7185><s%> your hearts, <S%H3824><s%> as at Meribah, <S%H4809><s%> As in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Massah <S%H4532><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%>
"When <S%H834><s%> your fathers tested <S%H1><s%> Me, They tried <S%H5254><s%> Me, though <S%H974><s%> they had seen <S%H1571><s%> My work. <S%H7200><s%>

"For forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> I loathed <S%H6962><s%> [that] generation, <S%H1755><s%> And said <S%H559><s%> they are a people <S%H5971><s%> who err <S%H8582><s%> in their heart, <S%H3824><s%> And they do not know <S%H3045><s%> My ways. <S%H1870><s%>
"Therefore <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> in My anger, <S%H639><s%> Truly <S%H518><s%> they shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into My rest. <S%H4496><s%>"
